name: sirevif-backend
description: Sistema de Registro de Violencia Intrafamiliar

scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start --prefix comisaria-service" "npm run start --prefix usuarios-service" "npm run start --prefix medidas-service" "npm run start --prefix gateway-service" "npm run start --prefix victimas-service" "npm run start --prefix victimarios-service"
